name: ASIAN MISSION FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Education / Capacity Development. Engage NGOs to work together on issues of common interest.To provide all-round training including capacity building, personality development and skill development of women and children. Women Empowerment Programs. Right to development through creative education, recreation and cultural activities.Right  Education & Shelter. To work towards creating a better Environment which provides basic health, education and empowerment to every citizen. Justice and equity for all.
